title: Meet the Blacks
summary: The Black family is getting out of Chicago in hopes of a better life. After Carl Black (Mike Epps) comes into some unexpected funds, he takes his family and leaves the hustling lifestyle behind for something better. Carl, his wife Lorena (Zulay Henao), son Carl Jr., daughter Allie Black (Bresha Webb) and cousin Cronut (Lil Duval) pack upThe Black family is getting out of Chicago in hopes of a better life. After Carl Black (Mike Epps) comes into some unexpected funds, he takes his family and leaves the hustling lifestyle behind for something better. Carl, his wife Lorena (Zulay Henao), son Carl Jr., daughter Allie Black (Bresha Webb) and cousin Cronut (Lil Duval) pack up and move to Beverly Hills. Turns out, Carl couldn’t have picked a worse time to move. They arrive right around the time of the annual purge, when all crime is legal for twelve hours.… Expand
critic_reviews: Meet the Blacks is an asinine film (though with a kernel of seriousness) but whenever it feels like it is running out of steam, something strange and surreal will happen to elevate it above a typical spoof movie.

It’s more like an extremely confusing and sloppily written chunk of Purge fan-fiction—a tortured use of another movie’s absurd mythology to help make muddled quasi-satirical points, while indulging the apparently fail-safe punchline of saying the word “purge” about once a minute.
Even by the standards of raunchy, comic spoofs, director and co-writer Deon Taylor’s film feels especially scattered.
A wrongheaded, utterly incompetent, and nearly laugh-free satire.

reviews.content: The Purge is not supposed to be a comedy ROFL. This is a horrible excuse for a film. Glad it has horrible reviews. It deserves them. YESSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS

Please, the Purge is already bad enough. This one's trying to be the comedy-friendly version of the Purge... which is completely (not) horrifying. Please save your brain at your house before going to the theaters to see this.

When I watch a movie and consider it the worst movie ever. I mean it, because I think I found the movie that can top Fifty Shades Of Black. First of all, it's another one of those dumbass spoof movies. Trust me, I've seen some so-so spoofWhen I watch a movie and consider it the worst movie ever. I mean it, because I think I found the movie that can top Fifty Shades Of Black. First of all, it's another one of those dumbass spoof movies. Trust me, I've seen some so-so spoof movies and let me tell you. There's more sh*tty spoof movies than so-so. Meet The Blacks will leave you without words because you will feel dumb and confused once you're done with it. I wanted to walk out but I needed more reasons to take a sh*t on this movie. I just hate how these so called actors think they're making something funny when in fact they're making themselves look stupid. Guys, just watch The Purge because that's already a joke. Forget this movie happened.

I don't know, it wasn't awful and it had a few laughs and made me chuckle a few times. It would have been better if it would have done more with its material than make cliche racial jokes and the actors looked like they cared.

Depressing,unfunny and over-all a **** film.This film is 94 minutes long,you will regret it cause it's not worth it,you will feel dumb or stupid when you walk out of theatre cause you've witnessed 2016's worst film.
Meet the Blacks is one of those movies where even watching the trailer makes you feel uncomfortable due to all the racist stereotypes present. This is like Friedberg/Seltzer levels of bad.
Racist garbage. Do not watch this film. Acting was crappy. The plotline was a ripoff of the Purge. I would definitely skip this movie and go watch something else.
The movie for the average middle american and the depressed city masses that will watch anything Sandler churns out. Also the title strikes me as an SJW fodder.

This movie is painfully bad and everything about this movie is just god damn awful. Awful actors, awful script, unfunny, very cliche, and worst of all it's super racist. It relies too much on offensive humor to make you laugh but mostly itThis movie is painfully bad and everything about this movie is just god damn awful. Awful actors, awful script, unfunny, very cliche, and worst of all it's super racist. It relies too much on offensive humor to make you laugh but mostly it will probably just irritates you because of how bad the humor is delivered.

A complete waste. Utter garbage. Do not waste time and money on this. You are better off sitting in a room watching the paint on the wall age. You will do less damage to your mental health. In fact, this movie should carry a health warning.

Is it dumb? Yes! Is it funny? Not really but all spoof movies aren't really funny I liked it apart from the racist jokes  with the Kkk being in it  if you like  spoofs and you like the purge u could maybe enjoy this
The “black spoof” genre continues with yet another entry sure to empty the wallets of any black person eager to hear the regurgitation of their victimhood world view.
